issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/118300260#manga](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pixiv.net%2Fartworks%2F118300260%23manga) ### Comment > Pixivにログインして当該URLのようなマンガを開いた後イラストをタップして、添付した画像のような状態にするとページ下部に空白ができる。 Username: `@WiFi-mon` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ovr1llxv0yog4gc0c4gkgg8s80wkk805kkyvvt206k.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot reproduce the issue with your settings.

Please try checking the filters updates, maybe it was already solved. If you’re still able to reproduce the issue, reopen it here. We’d appreciate if you supply additional information or screenshots.
